branchItem.name: Valves Air/Water
branchItem.description: <p>Solenoid control valves are good for general purpose use.  Direct acting poppet valves available in normally closed and normally open varieties.  Available in a varietey of materials including resin, aluminum, brass and stainless  steel.</p>

branchItem.name: Valves Oil/High Temp Oil
branchItem.description: <p>Process control solenoid valves for oil (fluid viscosity not exceeding 50 mm&sup2;/s) is available with brass and stainless steel body. Three body sizes are available, with port size ranges from 1/8 to 1/2 inch. FKM seal is  standard and EPDM is optional. Flow rate ranges from Cv of 0.23 to 49.</p>

branchItem.name: Valves Steam/Heated Water
branchItem.description: <p>Direct air and solenoid operated 2 and 3 port valves can be used with a wide variety of fluids. The manifolds are available in a common SUP style or individual SUP style (for vacuum use). The VXA31/32  series manifold is individually ported. Valves for both are easily replaced without changing existing piping.</p>

branchItem.name: Valves & Pumps, Chemicals/Pure Water
branchItem.description: <p>Solenoid valve is designed for special applications like air, gas, steam, water and oil.  The VXK includes a Y type strainer installed inside the body to remove foreign materials mixed in fluids  before they enter the actuating part of the valve (armature), as well as preventing the flow of foreign materials to downstream equipment.  The VXH is high pressure capable of a maximum operating pressure is 2.0  MPa.</p>

branchItem.name: Valves Coolant
branchItem.description: <p>Coolant solenoid valve provides the perfect solution for high speed machining and is available as solenoid or air operated. Features like a scraper, squeeze seal, grease channel and dry bearing construction,  increases the valves service life.</p>

branchItem.name: Valves Dust Collector
branchItem.description: <p>Dust collector, 2 port solenoid valve has large port sizes and the flange and flange body type. These are designed with low noise construction and has the option of a silencer.</p>

branchItem.name: Valves Color Change
branchItem.description: <p>Color change solenoid valves are applicable for water/chemical base paint, in, cleaning solvent and air.</p>

branchItem.name: Valves Specialized Application
branchItem.description: <p>2-port solenoid valve was designed for special applications like air, gas, steam, water and oil.  The VXK includes a Y type strainer installed inside the body to remove foreign materials mixed in fluids  before they enter the actuating part of the valve (armature), as well as preventing the flow of foreign materials to downstream equipment.  The VXH is high pressure capable of a maximum operating pressure is 2.0  MPa.</p>

branchItem.name: Process Pumps
branchItem.description: <p>Fluid process pumps are designed specifically to meet industry demands, SMC's series diaphragm pumps are constructed to be used with using high purity chemicals.  Our pumps are lightweight, compact, high flow rate solution to meet the most demanding needs.</p>

branchItem.name: Industrial Filters
branchItem.description: <p>Industrial filters series offers a variety of elements that can be selected according to the filtration conditions and are suitable for high flow rate filtration</p>

branchItem.name: Water Equipment
branchItem.description: <p>When straining and regulation of small water lines is required, SMC's water regulator and strainer can be used to prepare your lines.</p>
